targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  avg(toUInt64(data.path.rtt_micros)) AS avg_rtt
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.rtt_micros IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})

SELECT
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.lost_packets)) AS total_lost_packets
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.lost_packets IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})

SELECT
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.congestion_events)) AS total_congestion_events
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.congestion_events IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})

SELECT
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_tx.bytes)) AS total_tx_bytes
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.udp_tx.bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})

SELECT
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_rx.bytes)) AS total_rx_bytes
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.udp_rx.bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})

SELECT
  avg(toUInt64(data.path.current_mtu)) AS avg_mtu
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.current_mtu IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  quantile(0.5)(toUInt64(data.path.rtt_micros)) AS p50,
  quantile(0.95)(toUInt64(data.path.rtt_micros)) AS p95,
  quantile(0.99)(toUInt64(data.path.rtt_micros)) AS p99
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.rtt_micros IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.lost_packets)) AS lost_packets,
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.sent_packets)) AS sent_packets
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.lost_packets IS NOT NULL
  AND data.path.sent_packets IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_tx.bytes)) / $__interval_s AS tx_bytes_per_sec,
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_rx.bytes)) / $__interval_s AS rx_bytes_per_sec
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.udp_tx.bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND data.udp_rx.bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_tx.datagrams)) AS tx_datagrams,
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_rx.datagrams)) AS rx_datagrams
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.udp_tx.datagrams IS NOT NULL
  AND data.udp_rx.datagrams IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.acks)) AS acks,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.ping)) AS ping,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.crypto)) AS crypto
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.acks)) AS acks,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.ping)) AS ping,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.crypto)) AS crypto
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.congestion_events)) AS congestion_events
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.congestion_events IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  avg(toUInt64(data.path.current_mtu)) AS avg_mtu,
  max(toUInt64(data.path.current_mtu)) AS max_mtu,
  min(toUInt64(data.path.current_mtu)) AS min_mtu
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.current_mtu IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  avg(toUInt64(data.path.cwnd)) AS avg_cwnd,
  max(toUInt64(data.path.cwnd)) AS max_cwnd,
  min(toUInt64(data.path.cwnd)) AS min_cwnd
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.cwnd IS NOT NULL
  AND data.path.cwnd != '18446744073709551615'
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.lost_bytes)) AS lost_bytes
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.path.lost_bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_tx.ios)) AS tx_ios,
  sum(toUInt64(data.udp_rx.ios)) AS rx_ios
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND data.udp_tx.ios IS NOT NULL
  AND data.udp_rx.ios IS NOT NULL
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.black_holes_detected)) AS black_holes,
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.lost_plpmtud_probes)) AS lost_probes,
  sum(toUInt64(data.path.sent_plpmtud_probes)) AS sent_probes
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.connection_close)) AS connection_close,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.handshake_done)) AS handshake_done,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.new_connection_id)) AS new_connection_id,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.new_token)) AS new_token,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.immediate_ack)) AS immediate_ack
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.connection_close)) AS connection_close,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.handshake_done)) AS handshake_done,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.new_connection_id)) AS new_connection_id,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.new_token)) AS new_token,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.immediate_ack)) AS immediate_ack
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.stream)) AS stream,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.max_data)) AS max_data,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.max_stream_data)) AS max_stream_data,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.max_streams_bidi)) AS max_streams_bidi,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_tx.max_streams_uni)) AS max_streams_uni
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeInterval(timestamp) AS time,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.stream)) AS stream,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.max_data)) AS max_data,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.max_stream_data)) AS max_stream_data,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.max_streams_bidi)) AS max_streams_bidi,
  sum(toUInt64(data.frame_rx.max_streams_uni)) AS max_streams_uni
FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  AND toString(data.host) IN (${host:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.staked) IN (${staked:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.env) IN (${env:singlequote})
  AND toString(data.identity) IN (${identity:singlequote})
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.host) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.host IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.host)
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.host) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.host IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.host)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.staked) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.staked IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.staked)
list.label: Staked
list.name: staked
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.staked) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.staked IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.staked)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.env) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.env IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.env)
list.label: Environment
list.name: env
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.env) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.env IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.env)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.identity) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.identity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.identity)
list.label: Identity
list.name: identity
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toString(data.identity) as __value FROM clickhouse_logs.validator_quic_metrics WHERE data.identity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY toString(data.identity)
